resource.chars: Picture, stuck on (â…” of page). Frame mainly red blue in triangles, ground blue and green. Above on R. Job kneels on rocks. The Divine Hand on R. On L. his seven sons and three daughters face R. Below on red ground, separated off by cusped line, Job seated on rocks, in blue loincloth only. His wife on L. holds a blank scroll. The initial and first words of text are introduced in the lower L. corner
